description: This is a seminar that discusses methodological aspects of conducting field research on non-human primates. After discussions of issues related to the planning and design of field studies and the proper training in necessary field techniques, students will conduct research on non-human primates. We will then discuss data management and analysis.
name: PRIMATE FLD MTHDS & DATA: Primate Field Methods and Data Analysis

section.name: PRIMATE FLD MTHDS & DATA: Primate Field Methods and Data Analysis
